languages.text: "Да что у тебя за проблемы с рекафом?!" {n}На миг кажется, что Саргона взорвется, но видимым усилием воли он берет себя в руки.{/n} "Если я сегодня выживу, клянусь, я дам тебе рекафа до конца жизни — я сварю тебя в нем!"

"What is it with you and recaf?" {n}For a moment, it looks like Sargona is about to explode, but then, with visible effort, he reins himself in.{/n} "If I survive today, I swear I'll see you supplied with recaf for the rest of your life — I'll boil you in it!"
languages.original_text: "Да что у тебя за проблемы с рекафом?!" {n}На миг кажется, что Саргона взорвется, но видимым усилием воли он берет себя в руки.{/n} "Если я сегодня выживу, клянусь, я дам тебе рекафа до конца жизни — я сварю тебя в нем!"

traits.locale_text: "What's your problem with the recaf?!" {n}For a moment, it seems Sargona will explode, but with a visible effort of will, he reins himself in.{/n} "If I survive today, I swear I'll see you supplied with recaf for the rest of your life. I'll boil you in it!"

"Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your weapon sparks and bounces off, unable to penetrate the strange screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"What is it with you and recaf?" {n}For a moment, it looks like Sargona is about to explode, but then, with visible effort, he reins himself in.{/n} "If I survive today, I swear I'll see you supplied with recaf for the rest of your life — I'll boil you in it!"

"What is it with you and recaf?" {n}For a moment, it looks like Sargona is about to explode, but then, with visible effort, he reins himself in.{/n} "If I survive today, I swear I'll see you supplied with recaf for the rest of your life — I'll boil you in it!"
{n}You bring your weapon to bear, and Sargona's shoulder explodes in a splatter of red.{/n}

"Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your weapon sparks and bounces off, unable to penetrate the strange screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"Hit that thing one more time and you'll be recaf!" {n}Your weapon sparks and bounces off, unable to penetrate the strange screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your weapon sparks and bounces off, unable to penetrate the strange screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your weapon sparks and bounces off, unable to penetrate the strange screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your weapon sparks and bounces off, unable to penetrate the strange screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"What's your problem with the recaf?!" {n}For a moment, it seems Sargona will explode, but with a visible effort of will, he reins himself in.{/n} "If I survive today, I swear I'll see you supplied with recaf for the rest of your life. I'll boil you in it!"

languages.text: «¿Pero qué narices te pasa con el café?» {n}Por un momento, Sargona parece a punto de explotar, pero hace un esfuerzo visible y se contiene.{/n} «Si salgo de esta con vida, me aseguraré de que tienes café para el resto de tu vida, ¡hirviéndote en él!».
languages.original_text: "What is it with you and recaf?" {n}For a moment, it looks like Sargona is about to explode, but then, with visible effort, he reins himself in.{/n} "If I survive today, I swear I'll see you supplied with recaf for the rest of your life — I'll boil you in it!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Pero qué narices te pasa con el café?» {n}Por un momento, Sargona parece a punto de explotar, pero hace un esfuerzo visible y se contiene.{/n} «Si salgo de esta con vida, me aseguraré de que tienes café para el resto de tu vida, ¡hirviéndote en él!».

languages.text: “你还跟雷卡咖啡没完了是不是？”{n}有那么一瞬间，萨戈纳像是要气炸了，但最后，他非常努力地克制住了自己的怒火。{/n}“如果我今天能活下来的话，我发誓，我以后会让你喝咖啡喝个够——我要把你放到咖啡壶里煮！”
languages.original_text: "What is it with you and recaf?" {n}For a moment, it looks like Sargona is about to explode, but then, with visible effort, he reins himself in.{/n} "If I survive today, I swear I'll see you supplied with recaf for the rest of your life — I'll boil you in it!"

traits.locale_text: “你还跟雷卡咖啡没完了是不是？”{n}有那么一瞬间，萨戈纳像是要气炸了，但最后，他非常努力地克制住了自己的怒火。{/n}“如果我今天能活下来的话，我发誓，我以后会让你喝咖啡喝个够——我要把你放到咖啡壶里煮！”
“再打那玩意儿一下，你自己就要变成雷卡咖啡了！”{n}你的武器火花迸射，反弹回来，完全无法穿破古怪的屏障。萨戈纳瞥了一眼旁边的发电机，似乎在检查发电机是否完好无损。{/n}

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que c'est que cette obsession pour le recaff ? » {n}L'espace d'un instant, Sargona semble sur le point d'exploser, mais il se ressaisit au prix d'un effort manifeste.{/n} « Si je survis à cette journée, je veillerai à ce que vous soyez {mf|approvisionné|approvisionnée} en recaff jusqu'à la fin de vos jours... et je vous ferai bouillir dedans ! »
languages.original_text: "What is it with you and recaf?" {n}For a moment, it looks like Sargona is about to explode, but then, with visible effort, he reins himself in.{/n} "If I survive today, I swear I'll see you supplied with recaf for the rest of your life — I'll boil you in it!"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que c'est que cette obsession pour le recaff ? » {n}L'espace d'un instant, Sargona semble sur le point d'exploser, mais il se ressaisit au prix d'un effort manifeste.{/n} « Si je survis à cette journée, je veillerai à ce que vous soyez {mf|approvisionné|approvisionnée} en recaff jusqu'à la fin de vos jours... et je vous ferai bouillir dedans ! »

languages.text: 「ならば近くに来て味わってみろ！それとも、焼かれるのが怖いのか？」{n}あなたの武器は火花を散らしながら跳ね返され、その奇妙なスクリーンを貫通することができなかった。サルゴナは横にある発生装置のひとつに素早く視線を向け、まだ無事かどうかを確かめるかのような様子を見せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your weapon sparks and bounces off, unable to penetrate the strange screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ならば近くに来て味わってみろ！それとも、焼かれるのが怖いのか？」{n}あなたの武器は火花を散らしながら跳ね返され、その奇妙なスクリーンを貫通することができなかった。サルゴナは横にある発生装置のひとつに素早く視線を向け、まだ無事かどうかを確かめるかのような様子を見せた。{/n}

languages.text: "Senin bu kahfe takıntın nedir böyle?" {n}Bir an için Sargona, patlamak üzere gibi görünse de gözle görülür bir çabanın ardından kendini kontrol altına alıyor.{/n} "Bugün sağ kalırsam yeminim olsun ki sana bir ömür yetecek kahfe tedarik edeceğim. O kahfeyle birlikte seni de pişireceğim!"
languages.original_text: "What is it with you and recaf?" {n}For a moment, it looks like Sargona is about to explode, but then, with visible effort, he reins himself in.{/n} "If I survive today, I swear I'll see you supplied with recaf for the rest of your life — I'll boil you in it!"

traits.locale_text: "Senin bu kahfe takıntın nedir böyle?" {n}Bir an için Sargona, patlamak üzere gibi görünse de gözle görülür bir çabanın ardından kendini kontrol altına alıyor.{/n} "Bugün sağ kalırsam yeminim olsun ki sana bir ömür yetecek kahfe tedarik edeceğim. O kahfeyle birlikte seni de pişireceğim!"

languages.text: "Was habt Ihr nur ständig mit Eurem Rekaf?" {n}Für einen Moment scheint es, als würde Sargona explodieren, ehe er sich mit sichtlicher Mühe beherrscht.{/n} "Sollte ich den heutigen Tag überleben, versorge ich Euch für den Rest Eures Lebens mit Rekaf ... indem ich Euch darin koche! Das schwöre ich!
languages.original_text: "What is it with you and recaf?" {n}For a moment, it looks like Sargona is about to explode, but then, with visible effort, he reins himself in.{/n} "If I survive today, I swear I'll see you supplied with recaf for the rest of your life — I'll boil you in it!"

Das schwöre ich!
